description.value:
Frequency once per 10 minutes

Trigger A creature within 30 feet of you targets you, and you can see the attacker.

Requirements You are in dim or bright light.

Your body's natural luster has been polished to a gleaming shine. You use this to reflect light back into your enemy's eyes, disrupting its aim and focus; it must succeed at a Reflex save against your class DC or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Dazzled] until the end of your next turn.
